question_variants: When is the Makkah Halal Forum?

answer.direct: Makkah Halal Forum (Third Edition) runs from 14 to 16 February 2026 (26-28 Shaaban 1447).
steps: Plan your visit between Saturday 14 February and Monday 16 February 2026
Confirm your target sessions by day before arriving
Arrive early for registration windows
mistakes: Confusing Gregorian dates with Hijri dates
Arriving after key sessions begin

answer.direct: The forum venue is the Makkah Chamber Exhibition & Convention Center.
steps: Use the venue name exactly in maps and ride apps
Check hall and theatre labels on arrival
Follow signage to registration first
mistakes: Going to a different chamber building
Skipping check-in before sessions

answer.direct: Day 1 (Saturday 14 February 2026) includes registration, high-level conference sessions, exhibition, B2B activity, experts corner, and evening roundtable.
steps: Registration opens at 1:30 PM and runs to 2:00 PM
Conference stage sessions run from 2:00 PM to 8:00 PM
Exhibition and networking activity continue into the evening
mistakes: Missing the opening block at 2:00 PM
Not reserving expert sessions in advance

answer.direct: Day 2 (Sunday 15 February 2026) includes conference sessions, a masterclass track, exhibition activity, experts corner, MoU signing platform, and opening ceremony.
steps: Complete registration between 1:30 PM and 2:00 PM
Prioritize theatre sessions and meeting-room masterclass times
Check evening events including MoU and ceremony windows
mistakes: Assuming all Day 2 activities are in one zone
Overlapping masterclass and conference plans

answer.direct: Day 3 (Monday 16 February 2026) features exhibition, B2B meetings, halal cooking show, women empowerment track, halalpreneurship track, and influencer gathering.
steps: Register at 1:30 PM before track sessions
Select either track sessions or B2B blocks first
Use the evening period for networking and influencer activities
mistakes: Trying to attend overlapping track sessions
Skipping the final-day networking slots

answer.direct: The B2B platform is a curated matchmaking track designed for targeted peer-to-peer and strategic business connections.
steps: Check day-specific B2B timing in the program
Arrive with your business profile and objectives
Use networking lounge periods to follow up
mistakes: Attending without clear meeting goals
Missing scheduled matching windows

question_variants: What is the Makkah landmarks guide?

answer.direct: The Landmarks Guide is an awareness guide for pilgrims that introduces key Makkah landmarks and their context.
steps: Open the landmarks guide in your preferred language
Use the contents page to jump to specific sites
Read each location note before visiting
mistakes: Using an unfamiliar language version
Skipping location context before travel

question_variants: Key places in the landmarks guide

answer.direct: The guide contents include landmarks such as Mount Thawr, Jabal Al-Noor and Hira Cave, and the Mosque of Aishah at At-Taneem.
steps: Check the contents page for landmark names
Select one landmark at a time to avoid confusion
Use local transport planning before visiting
mistakes: Mixing up similarly named sites
Attempting too many sites in one trip

question_variants: Quelles sont les dates du forum ?
Quand se tient le Makkah Halal Forum ?

answer.direct: Le Makkah Halal Forum (troisieme edition) se tient du 14 au 16 fevrier 2026 (26-28 Chaabane 1447).
steps: Choisissez votre jour entre le samedi 14 et le lundi 16 fevrier 2026
Verifiez le programme de la journee avant d'arriver
Arrivez tot pour la phase d'inscription
mistakes: Confondre les dates gregoriennes et hijri
Arriver apres le debut des sessions importantes

question_variants: Quel est le lieu de l'evenement ?

answer.direct: Le forum se deroule au Centre d'exposition et de congres de la Chambre de commerce de La Mecque.
steps: Utilisez le nom complet du lieu dans votre application de transport
Passez d'abord par la zone d'inscription
Suivez la signalisation vers le theatre ou le hall principal
mistakes: Se rendre dans un batiment different avec un nom proche
Ignorer l'enregistrement avant les sessions

answer.direct: Le Jour 1 (samedi 14 fevrier 2026) comprend inscription, conference de haut niveau, exposition, plateforme B2B, espace experts halal et table ronde en soiree.
steps: Inscription de 1:30 pm a 2:00 pm
Sessions conference de 2:00 pm a 8:00 pm
Verifiez les activites d'exposition et de networking en soiree
mistakes: Manquer l'ouverture a 2:00 pm
Ne pas reserver l'espace experts a l'avance

question_variants: Quel est le programme du Jour 2 ?

answer.direct: Le Jour 2 (dimanche 15 fevrier 2026) inclut conference, masterclass, exposition, espace experts, plateforme de signature MoU et ceremonie d'ouverture.
steps: Terminez l'inscription entre 1:30 pm et 2:00 pm
Coordonnez vos horaires entre theatre et salle de reunion
Confirmez les evenements de soiree
mistakes: Supposer que toutes les activites sont dans une seule zone
Planifier des sessions qui se chevauchent

answer.direct: Le Jour 3 (lundi 16 fevrier 2026) propose exposition, reunions B2B, show culinaire halal, parcours Women Empowerment, parcours HalalPreneurship et rassemblement d'influenceurs.
steps: Passez par l'inscription en debut d'apres-midi
Choisissez vos priorites entre parcours et reunions B2B
Utilisez la soiree pour le networking
mistakes: Essayer d'assister a des sessions en conflit horaire
Ne pas exploiter les creneaux de reseautage

answer.direct: La plateforme B2B est un dispositif de mise en relation ciblee pour faciliter des rencontres professionnelles strategiques entre acteurs du halal.
steps: Consultez les horaires B2B du jour
Preparez un profil entreprise et des objectifs clairs
Faites le suivi pendant les periodes de networking
mistakes: Venir sans objectif de rendez-vous
Rater les creneaux de matching

question_variants: Qu'est-ce que le guide des lieux emblematiques ?
Guide des lieux de la Mecque
Comment utiliser le guide des lieux ?

answer.direct: Le guide des lieux emblematiques de la Mecque est un guide de sensibilisation pour orienter les pelerins vers les sites majeurs.
steps: Ouvrez la version linguistique adaptee
Utilisez le sommaire pour aller au lieu souhaite
Lisez les indications avant la visite
mistakes: Utiliser une version linguistique non adaptee
Se deplacer sans verifier le contexte du site

question_variants: Quels lieux sont mentionnes dans le guide ?

answer.direct: Le sommaire mentionne notamment le mont Thawr, le mont An-Noor et la grotte de Hira, ainsi que la mosquee de Aichah au miqat d'At-Tanim.
steps: Selectionnez un seul lieu a la fois
Verifiez l'itineraire avant depart
Respectez les consignes locales sur place
mistakes: Confondre des lieux aux noms proches
Programmer trop de lieux en une seule sortie

question_variants: Where can I see the venue map?

answer.direct: You can view the event floor plan to locate halls, stage areas, and key service points.
steps: Open the floor plan from the kiosk floor-plan option
Check hall labels and pathways before moving
Use the marked entrances and service desk points for navigation
mistakes: Walking to a hall without checking the plan first
Mixing up similarly named zones

question_variants: How do I get to a specific hall?
Find a hall on the floor plan

answer.direct: Use the floor plan to identify your hall, nearest corridor, and the shortest access route from your current zone.
steps: Locate your current position on the map
Find your target hall label
Follow the corridor path and nearest directional signs
mistakes: Following crowd flow without confirming hall label
Ignoring entry points shown on the map

question_variants: Where is the main stage on the map?
How do I reach the stage area?

answer.direct: The floor plan identifies the main stage area and adjacent zones so you can approach from the correct side.
steps: Find the stage marker on the floor plan
Use the nearest access corridor shown
Arrive early for better seating and smoother entry
mistakes: Entering from a restricted or wrong side
Arriving at the stage area after session start
